mapper.select: select * from employees order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into employees(employee_id, first_name, last_name, job_id, manager_id, department_id, hire_date, phone_number, salary, email, commission_pct) values(seq_employee.nextval, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{job_id}, #{manager_id}, #{department_id}, #{hire_date}, #{phone_number}, #{salary}, #{email}, #{commission_pct})
mapper.update: update employees set first_name=#{first_name}, last_name=#{last_name}, job_id=#{job_id}, manager_id=#{manager_id}, department_id=#{department_id}, hire_date=#{hire_date}, phone_number=#{phone_number}, salary=#{salary}, email=#{email}, commission_pct=#{commission_pct} where employee_id=#{employee_id}
